trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Logansport
There were no other sightings in Logansport on or around August 6th 2008
Summary: Amber like ball of light above river
divs: Sighting DetailsI had been sitting at the rivers edge for hours watching my kids play.. the sun was going down,and was pretty much below the horizon i looked to my left, which would be looking West. and i saw an amber ball of light stationary for only a few moments.. then about 5 minutes later the same light appeared again but much closer than what it was before, another strange thing that i don't know if its significant to the sighting or not is that the birds and bugs got really really thick in the general area where i was sitting only for the moments that this thing was near.. i watched it for a moment, and it startled me so much that i was screaming at my kids down the river to look up "hurry and look up!" but they were to far away to hear me... but as i was viewing it it almost seem to disappear into nothing like in a blink it was gone...
